newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Palestinian killed, Israeli soldier hurt in Gaza.
newsitem.headline: Palestinian killed, Israeli soldier hurt in Gaza.

text.p: A Palestinian was shot dead and an Israeli soldier wounded in a gunbattle in the Gaza Strip on Thursday, hospital sources and the Israeli army said.

Shifa hospital said Hani Moussa was shot dead and seven Palestinians were wounded in the clash. Witnesses said the clashes took place near Kfar Darom Jewish settlement. The Israeli army said the soldier was moderately wounded in the clash.
